title: Democratization is elec. competition, rule of law

content.prompt: Which of the following is the best indicator of a successful transition to democracy?

choices.label: One political party dominates all institutions of government.
Several political parties merge to form one centrist party.
Judges defer to elected officials when interpreting the constitution.
Political actors accept electoral competition, citizen participation, and rule of law.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
